title: Interpretation of a dove in a dream - To see a dove in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pigeon or pigeon for a single, married, pregnant or divorced girl, whether she is white, white or black, or the death of a bird, hunting, slaughtering, eating meat, etc., for a son. Sirin, Nabulsi, and Imam al-SadiqThe pigeons in a dream by Ibn Sirin Muhammad ibn Sirin talked about the interpretation of seeing a dove and a dove in a dream in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams, where he mentioned several pieces of evidence related to seeing them. As for seeing the bird with the doves and escaping from the fortune-teller, or seeing the dead doves, or confusion and catching the doves, This vision portends failure or defeat. A white dove in a dream. Seeing a white dove in a dream is a sign of safety and security in general, especially in earning a living. Seeing a slaughtered white dove indicates disagreements and competition, and seeing a dove’s nest indicates harmony and familiarity, while seeing pigeon eggs White is an indication of obtaining abundant money. Hearing the sound of pigeons in a dream is a sign of sadness, separation, and bad news. Seeing pigeon feathers in a dream means marriage, and hunting white pigeons in a dream is a sign of good news of success. Black pigeons in a dream. Seeing a black dove in a dream is a sign On disputes and conflicts and portends the outbreak of wars or a reign of injustice, murder and destruction. As for an unmarried girl who sees a black dove in her dream, this is an indication that a reckless and irresponsible person will seek to associate with her and marry her. Seeing a black dove’s nest in a dream is a sign of destruction and devastation, Seeing black pigeon meat in a dream indicates immorality and disobedience, and seeing black pigeon eggs is a sign of sins and disobedience. The sound of black pigeons is a sign and warning of unhappiness and despair, and black pigeon feathers are evidence of the husband’s betrayal of his wife and vice versa. Gray pigeons in a dream. As for seeing a gray dove in a dream, it is It is a sign of the abundance of food and portends the birth of a male child in a pregnant woman’s dream. Eating gray pigeon meat in a dream is evidence of a permissible diet and the goodness that is blessed in it. Slaughtering gray pigeons in a dream indicates alienation and the end of the womb relationship, and seeing a gray pigeon’s nest indicates stability and balance between families. Seeing gray doves flying is a sign of joy and good news, and seeing chicks or young gray pigeons is a sign of procreation and the goodness of the dreamer’s state and religion. If the chick is a male, but if the chick is a female, it is a sign of joy and kindness. As for hearing the sound of gray doves, it is a sign of success and progress. Catching gray pigeons portends committing a crime, and trapping gray pigeons means imprisonment, trial, exile, or serious illness. Colored pigeons in a dream Seeing colored pigeons in a dream is an indication of the coming days filled with happiness, joy, and happy occasions. It is good news in an unmarried girl’s dream that she can marry whomever she wants, and that marrying a married woman is a sign of friendship, love, and mutual respect between her and her husband. Seeing colored pigeons in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of twins. Whether it was seeing eggs

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream or dream. Seeing him reciting Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream indicates piety, piety, overcoming difficulties, and freedom from worry, envy, and sorcery. We will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream for a married, single, and pregnant woman. In a dream for a married man, an unmarried young man, and an unmarried, married girl. And a pregnant woman, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, through providing interpretations by major commentators such as Imam Muhammad bin Sirin. , for 'this is with us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah recited in a dream by the scholar Ibn Sirin: Dreaming of reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream, it indicates longevity and good work. Seeing Surat Al-Baqarah recited in a low voice, it indicates many good deeds and many deeds. Good and good ways for the dreamer. If the ruler or judge sees himself reciting Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream, it appears that his time is near. Watching the recitation of Surat Al-Baqarah indicates the existence of a legacy that there is a conflict between men and women in the family. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream indicates freedom from marital and family problems. What is the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a girl reading or listening to Surat Al-Baqarah indicates going through difficult stages, achieving success and distinction, and avoiding sins and transgressions. Seeing reciting Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates good deeds with a long life and a protector from Satan. Vision. Reciting Surat Al-Baqarah to a girl in a dream announces freedom from enemies, hypocrites, and envy. What is the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah recited in a dream for a married woman: Seeing Surat Al-Baqarah recited in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her married life and happiness with her husband and children. Seeing reading or hearing Surat Al-Baqarah for a married woman in a dream announces She is pregnant if she has not given birth in the past. Seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream indicates protection from the whispers of Satan, and salvation from magic and envy. What is the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream for a pregnant woman: A dream about reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the nearness of the end of pain, trouble and ease. Childbirth. A dream about reading or listening to Surat Al-Baqarah for a pregnant woman, which indicates protection from envy and magic and the piety of the boy in his old age. Seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a pregnant woman’s dream shows that the mother and newborn enjoy good health and longevity. What is the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah recited in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing him reciting Surat A cow in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the satisfaction of her desires and her protection from worry and anxiety. Seeing or hearing Surah Al-Baqarah indicates her salvation from enemies and evil friends and her salvation from envy and magic. Seeing reading Surat Al-Baqarah indicates freedom from worries and sorrows, the longevity of the dreamer, good deeds and obedience. What Interpretation of a dream about reciting Surat Al-Baqarah over the jinn: Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Baqarah in the jinn expresses faith and piety in the dreamer and the high position he will reach. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream indicates integrity, obedience to God, and overcoming difficulties and obstacles. What is its interpretation?

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in Ibn Sirin’s hair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair has different interpretations divided into good and bad, as hair lice are harmful insects that cause discomfort and itching, so the dream is often related to the thoughts that fill the head and the psychological state that the viewer suffers from, but it also describes some of the current or future events that he may encounter The dreamer in life in addition to many other cases and interpretations that we will see below. Interpretation of a dream about lice in poetryInterpreters agree that this dream is related to many negative and bad thoughts circulating in the dreamer’s mind. Perhaps he embraces himself with a desire to take revenge on some of the characters who caused him psychological harm. In the past, but he must be careful. Burning with the fire of revenge. As for the one who removes lice from the head of a family member, he has rare morals, helps the needy, and seeks to help his friends and loved ones from all the crises they suffer from. If the lice falls from the head to the clothes and forehead, this means that this person is a bad person who is hated by many people from He is around him because he harms everyone with his biting tongue and his cruel actions towards everyone. He needs to be careful before he loses more good relationships. While there is an opinion that a large number of head lice means assuming an important management position or getting a big promotion because it gives influence and authority, it also carries more burdens and responsibilities. Interpretation of a dream about lice In the poetry of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin says that seeing lice in the hair expresses a bad psychological state due to the many difficult situations that the viewer has been exposed to recently. Also, itchy lice indicate bad news and unexpected news that may bring many changes in all circumstances in the near future. As for the man who shaves his head to get rid of lice, this means that he will change his job and field of work to find a better job that will bring him more gains and profits. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a single woman: Seeing lice on the head of an unmarried girl and her hair bleeding from her hair on both sides of her head means that she is thinking a lot In the difficulties she faces and the obstacles that stand in her way and hinder her path and steps. Towards achieving her goals. As for the single woman who finds someone to remove lice from her head, she will meet the right person for her who will remove the fears and unhappiness from her heart so that she can love and care for her to achieve happiness and security. Likewise, the unmarried woman who sees figures surrounded by many head lice, she must She is wary of those around her, as she is surrounded by bad company who try to force her to commit sins and walk with them among the people. It spoils her reputation and spoils her praiseworthy status among the people. Some also believe that the appearance of head lice for an unmarried woman could be related to problems with her family and loved ones and severe quarrels that occur between her family members. Interpretation of a dream about removing lice from the hair of an unmarried womanRemoving lice from the hair for single people It means that she will get rid of her fears and have the courage and courage to move forward with strength and determination

title: Hugging someone I know, interpretation of dreams for a single woman and the meaning of a strong hug

preview.html: In the interpretation of a single woman hugging someone I know, there are many different interpretations and interpretations, sometimes indicating praiseworthy meanings and other unfavorable meanings. And people, and in this encyclopedia article we present some different interpretations of seeing a hug from someone you know in a dream. Hugging someone I know. Interpretation of dreams for a single woman. In the event that an unmarried girl sees in her dream a hug from behind, then the dream is an indication of a feeling of love, happiness, and affection toward the people in this person’s life. Girl. When an unmarried woman sees someone she knows hugging her from behind, this dream is an indication of this person’s love for her and that he is trying to make her happy and satisfy her. Seeing a hug from behind in general for a single girl is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate goodness and happiness in the dreamer’s life. An unmarried woman hugging a deceased person in a dream indicates the return of one of her traveling loved ones or reconciliation of quarrels. Also, seeing an unmarried girl dreaming of embracing and kissing her is an indication of the approaching date of her wedding, as well as choosing a suitable life partner for her. Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone for a married woman: A married woman sees In her dream, someone she doesn't know is hugging her from behind. In the dream, this is an indication that there are many bad things in this woman’s life and evidence that she will get into some problems, but this woman will overcome all these problems. Seeing someone she knows hugging her from behind in a dream, in this dream is an indication of her emotional need. She is strong for her husband and that she needs him very much, and her subconscious prepares this matter in this way in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about hugging a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream about someone she never knows hugging her from behind in a dream. In a dream, this is an indication that her due date is approaching and evidence that she will give birth easily and smoothly and that she will have a child with a good face and personality. Seeing her as hugging someone in a dream is an indication that she feels great tenderness and kindness in her life and showing kindness in her life. Seeing a pregnant woman Hugging a dead person in a dream is an indication of the fulfillment of many long-awaited desires. Hugging someone. Dream interpretation for a divorced woman. A divorced woman sees in a dream someone she does not know hugging her in a dream. This indicates the presence of a person with whom she feels intense love and who is present in her life. Her vision of a dead person is an indication of the fulfillment of many long-awaited desires. He hugs her from behind, and this person she did not know. In the dream, it is an indication of the achievement of many things that this woman desired. Likewise, in the vision, it is an indication of the disappearance of the worries and problems that the woman is going through in her life. Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is hugging Another woman besides his wife, the dream is an indication that this man will have a lot of money and will be blessed with many good things. If a man sees in a dream that he is hugging his wife, the dream is evidence that this man loves his wife deeply, and is evidence of affection and familiarity. Between them. Also, seeing a man in a dream embracing an unknown woman

title: The 30 most important interpretations of seeing a basin in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sink in a dream: The word “sink” is always associated with the presence of dirt and filth, because it is a place where unpleasant and unpleasant odors accumulate, and the appearance of insects in these places is normal, and the word “sink” comes from swallowing and swallowing. . These two things are not desirable to see in a dream, and they are undesirable and do not deserve praise. Interpretation of a dream about a sink in a dream: The pit is a source for getting rid of malevolent things and a place for impure water, even though it is abhorrent to all people. Imagine if there was no drain, there would be chaos in the homes and streets as a result of the water that was used not being drained, and drainage in reality is no different from the interpretation of seeing a drain in a dream. All circumstances are unpleasant. Seeing a drain in a dream means that there is magic in your life that affects you, but you do not feel it, because the magician uses some of this dirt in achieving what he does, and this magic is only active if it is there. Some impurity. You tried to fix the drain, and I saw the appearance of some insects, such as a cockroach, walking alive without you killing them, and they had escaped from the drain. This indicates that there are those who want to harm you and plan evil and envy against you and harbor hatred and jealousy towards you and your family, and they are not happy about achieving success and achieving what you want in your life. If you kill these cockroaches, this means that you will get rid of your enemies and end your quarrels with those who are against you and you will triumph over them. Opening a sewer in a dream means that you are a person capable of managing your affairs, dealing with your problems, and knowing all their aspects, and that you think well and take firm steps towards finding solutions, ending problems and your fears, and overcoming them. Seeing an unknown hole and a strange shape, contrary to the normal and known form of life, symbolizes a disreputable adulterous woman. She is dishonest and corrupt and takes advantage of those around her to corrupt society. Evidence of the loss or loss of some close people. Trying to escape from a place with sewage is evidence of the end of crises that disturb the life of the dreamer. Seeing sewage far from home, this is an indication that you will get rid of problems. And that you will enjoy comfort after a long period of disagreements and problems. Interpretation of seeing drains in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Unclean water that comes out of the drain with some dirt and you fear that it will reach you is evidence of avoiding difficulties. Sweeping the drain, cleaning it, and returning water to it without interruption indicates that you are a person capable of Solve crises and problems and have logical and intelligent thinking. In a dream, a person may be exposed to a major problem, because of this problem he hears an insult from some of the people around him or insulting words that hurt his feelings. If you dream that you opened the bank and found valuable things in it, this means that you will inherit a new property that you did not Take care of it. Seeing a drain in a dream may be the condition of a wife who is not managed, cannot manage the responsibility of her home successfully and does not deserve to bear the responsibility. A drain in a dream indicates the closeness of the person in the dream to a woman with a bad character, and if the drain is blocked, this indicates To a good situation. The aquarium symbolizes that the dreamer

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream, and the interpretation of seeing making sweets in a dream.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream The public’s statements about the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream vary, each one according to the state in which he sees joy or reflects the interpretation of the living conditions he is going through, and certainly the scholars’ interpretations will be clearer and more. Expressing its interpretation and reflection on the dreamer's life, so we will present the most prominent interpretations of the dream of sweets in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream? It is said in the interpretation of sweets in a dream that they are signs of goodness and the coming of livelihood to the monarch. Sweets in a dream are also referred to as signs of a person's good condition and good work in this world, because they are signs of the piety of the viewer in his dealings with others. Likewise, sweets in a dream for a man may express the correctness of the opinion and the high status enjoyed by the noisy vision among family and friends, and in the interpretation of the dream it is an indication of the person's nobility and status. Seeing sweets in a dream is a sign of facilitating the good things that a person is looking for in his life, and it is good for the dreamer to get what he wants to reach. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the dream of sweets in a dream that they are signs of joy and pleasure that a person preaches in his dreams. If the dreamer who dreams of sweets in his dream is an unmarried young man, then in the interpretation of the dream it is an indication of a close marriage with a girl of a religious and moral character and evidence of the joy that the dreamer feels. You will be tested in the coming days. Also, the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream is an indication of the lawful profits that the merchant will achieve from his current trade, as it can be a reference to one's lifestyle in general. Seeing sweets in a dream of a knowledge seeker expresses the unprecedented superiority that he will enjoy in the periods following this dream, and in the dream there are indications of the superiority and high status that he will reach. For the person who receives sweets in his dream, this may symbolize that he will receive advice that will correct his life or that he will gain knowledge that will benefit him in this world. The Egyptian website is the largest website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type the Egyptian dream interpretation website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman. The most important interpretation of a single girl seeing sweets in her dream is that it is good news that expresses the proximity of her marriage and her marriage to a man of good character and whom she loves. If the unmarried girl who saw the dream kindly in her dream has been proposed to by a young man recently, then the interpretation of the dream is a sign that it is beneficial to her and may be instructions for the dreamer to agree to marry this man. Also, seeing sweets in the dream of an unmarried girl It symbolizes the ease of things for her in marriage or success in her studies if the dreamer is a student. If the unmarried girl goes through long periods of crises with her family and sees in a dream that she is taking candy from someone in a dream, then t

title: Interpretation of seeing a mole in a dream and a sign in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of moles, sulfur grains in a dream, for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, on the face or body, on the cheek in the hand, removing large and small black ones Ibn Shirin They are dark colored marks found on the surface of human skin, some of which add beauty to a person, and some of which cause Anxiety or becomes a birth defect in the bearer. A mole and mark indicate distinction and uniqueness in something different from the rest of the people. It may be a blessing or an advantage in the dreamer’s personality or something similar. A mole in a dream can be a symbol of distinction and difference that distinguishes the dreamer from the rest around him. A mole in a dream can be a symbol of distress and anxiety in some dreams. Seeing a mole on another person can indicate that he He faces problems, that is, the person who has a mole. The location of a mole on the body has specific indicators: face, hand, leg. Seeing a mole on the face in a dream indicates excellence in good qualities, tolerance, and diligence. Seeing a mole on the hand in a dream indicates abundance of sustenance and talent in some field. Seeing A mole on the knee in a dream indicates latent energy and the desire for change. To see many moles on your friend’s face, you count some of his mistakes that you see clearly and you feel that these mistakes affect his ability to do what you do. title: Seeing black ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing black ants in a dream: This vision is considered one of the dreams that causes panic and anxiety to its owner and includes many different interpretations that often lead to the occurrence of some unwanted events, according to what was presented by the most famous interpretation scholars. I saw it. Seeing black ants in a dream. The dream of black ants coming out of the house is considered a dream that indicates sadness. Whoever sees black ants coming out of the vagina is considered a sign that he has committed some indecent and forbidden act such as prostitution. Black ants that fly in the sky indicate the flight of children or a sign of a breakup. The dreamer about one of his family members and his sadness because of that. Dreaming of dead black ants in a dream indicates separation and distance from some close people, and God knows best. Seeing black ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing black ants in the country symbolizes the spread of rebellion and immorality among the residents of that place. To dream of black ants leaving the house means that the owners of this house will be subjected to theft and deception. Seeing black ants standing and not moving in a dream is a good sign that indicates longevity and good health. The dreamer who sees himself in a dream and hears the sound of ants in his dream is an indication of He has reached a famous and distinguished position. Seeing black ants in a dream for a single woman. A girl who has not yet married. If she sees black ants in her dream, this is a sign of the fears and machinations of some people around her. To dream of many ants in a virgin girl’s dream means that she will fall into some Problems are an indication of a difficult situation and living in a bad psychological state. Seeing small black ants in a dream for an engaged girl indicates that there are many disagreements with her fiancé’s family and a lack of understanding. A virgin girl seeing black ants on her clothes symbolizes that she will fall into some family disputes with her family. But if the ants were on her bed, this would lead to her getting married in the near future at the hands of a miserable woman, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing large black ants in a dream for a single woman? Seeing large black ants in an unmarried girl’s dream leads to many burdens on her shoulders. To dream Big black ants in a dream indicates marriage to a person with a high status in society. Seeing black ants in a dream for a married woman. Seeing black ants walking on the wall in a married woman’s dream symbolizes preserving her home and her desire to provide care and attention to both the husband and children. Seeing ants walking on the wall in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the preservation of her home and her desire to provide care and attention to both the husband and children. Black in the wife’s bed means that she is pregnant, and dreaming of black ants in a married woman’s dream means falling into some enmity and enmity with the husband’s family. Seeing the husband being bitten by a black ant leads to his bad reputation among people and is an indication that others are talking bad about him, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing ants Small black ants in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees small black ants walking on her body in a dream, this means that her condition is good and she is ready to perform her duties and worship. Seeing small black ants symbolizes that the visionary person will avoid doing anything wrong.

title: What is the most important interpretation of dreaming of buying sweets in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying sweets in a dream: Sweets are undoubtedly delicious foods, and some may abstain from them to maintain their physical condition or follow the doctor’s instructions, especially for diabetics, but what is the significance of this vision? Why is it important to see it? What is important, what does the vision of the confectionery market express? This vision varies based on many details, including the taste of the sweets, whether the viewer desires it or not, and whether he buys or sells the sweets, and in this article you will find all the signs and symbols for you to review. Buying sweets in a dream. Buying sweets in a dream. Seeing sweets in a dream means prosperity, well-being, a feeling of bliss and comfort, and obtaining benefits and allowances. Whoever was poor and saw sweets in his dream, his condition changed and he attained a period of prosperity and elevation and his affairs went for the better. With regard to the interpretation of the dream of buying sweets, these The vision is an indicator of the decisions that a person has made at some point and have begun to reap their fruits and the many developments that he sees in his life that have a positive impact on him. If the fortuneteller is a trader, then this vision is a sign of large profits and a high profit rate, and entering into contracts and investment partnerships that generate income. Having money and receiving it is a period of many changes at all levels. And if you see that someone gave you a gift of sweets, this symbolizes the great reward that you will receive in the near future, and the rewards that you deserve for your great personal efforts. Seeing that you buy sweets can be a sign of psychological comfort. , getting rid of many acute problems and crises and starting a new period of your life, in which you will receive a lot of nourishment and kindness. Psychologically, this vision expresses a person who has the ability to persuade and is flexible, which makes him able to build relationships and partnerships that last for long periods of time. The vision of buying sweets is often a message from the subconscious about the body’s need for proper nutrition, as the viewer must differentiate between proteins, sugars, and carbohydrates. Buying sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing sweets represents a good life, abundance of livelihood and money, and the ability to fight battles and obtain Whatever you want from it. Whoever sees that he is buying sweets has earned a lot of money, and has benefited from some projects and projects that he decided to implement immediately. This vision is also important in commercial transactions, intelligence in the process of buying and selling, exchanging benefits and benefits, and gaining status and prestige among People and pure fame. If one sees that he is buying a lot of sweets, it means that he will have some pleasant circumstances in the coming days or hear a lot of long-awaited happy news that will have a great impact in changing the course of life. On the other hand, this vision indicates To eloquent language and beautiful speech, you cite people’s merits and ignore their equality, and work to build relationships and strengthen bonds. And if you see that you are buying candy to give to someone, this indicates...
